definitions.definition: to write your name, usually on a written or printed document, to show that you agree with its contents or have written or created it yourself:
in sport, to make a legal written agreement to employ a player:
examples: The team has just signed a new player.

definitions.definition: a notice giving information, directions, a warning, etc.:
a movement of the body that gives information or an instruction:
examples: She pointed to her watch as a sign that it was getting late and she wanted to leave.
